page.title: 10THE BULL PUBLIC HOUSE
page.content: I live at the 'Bull',which is a public house in the market place in Romford.In the morning the pub opens at 11a.m.,apart from Sundays when it opens at 12p.m.It closes at 2.3O.p.m. and opens for the evening at 6p.m.On most days the pub closes at 1O.3Op.m.(last orders at 1O.2O),apart from Fridays and Saturdays,when it closes at 11p.m.It has 2 bars;the saloon bar,which mostly caters for younger people,and the public bar caters for mainly older men.No_one under the age of 18 can buy drinks and the age limit for going into the pub is 14.The saloon bar is dearer and has snack food(pub grub) and both bars have amusement machines and juke boxes.The most popular drink sold is beer,followed by spirits e.g.whisky,vodka and gin.
